name: That's enough slices
description:
Quick game made in only 7 minutes for the 7 minute jam.

Recommended to use fullscreen.

Just click (and hold down) the left mouse button to slice the pizzas along the black line. 

(The pizza slices cloning was a last minute addition I added for the video only - it only took me a minute to add but I did not complete that in the 7 minutes, though maybe per rule 5 that can count as a last minute finishing touch?)

Proof video: (proof starts at 1:10 minutes in): 

Pizza image was made with stable diffusion AI

Audio is from a meme video, made by @fantano on youtube (originally it was on tiktok)
